pullRequest.title: [JENKINS-60972] Set 'Dashboard' as first breadcrumb
pullRequest.bodyText:
This can be replaced when a proper Breadcrumbs module is built in the "backend" but since such bigger effort seems to have been hanging for several months (#4634) I think this workaround might be a good temporary solution to get the "Home" breadcrumb already in place.
See JENKINS-60972.
EDIT: As per the discussion in the comments, we are opting for "Dashboard" instead of "Home", as it is already referenced as "dashboard" in many places in the codebase.
Screenshot of the result

EDIT: See updated screenshot in a comment below.
Proposed changelog entries

UX: First Breadcrumb (home page) is now named "Dashboard"

Proposed upgrade guidelines
N/A
Submitter checklist

 (If applicable) Jira issue is well described
 Changelog entries and upgrade guidelines are appropriate for the audience affected by the change (users or developer, depending on the change). Examples

Fill-in the Proposed changelog entries section only if there are breaking changes or other changes which may require extra steps from users during the upgrade


 Appropriate autotests or explanation to why this change has no tests
 For dependency updates: links to external changelogs and, if possible, full diffs


Desired reviewers
@fqueiruga @batmat @schottsfired @sladyn98 @oleg-nenashev
Maintainer checklist
Before the changes are marked as ready-for-merge:

 There are at least 2 approvals for the pull request and no outstanding requests for change
 Conversations in the pull request are over OR it is explicit that a reviewer does not block the change
 Changelog entries in the PR title and/or Proposed changelog entries are correct
 Proper changelog labels are set so that the changelog can be generated automatically
 If the change needs additional upgrade steps from users, upgrade-guide-needed label is set and there is a Proposed upgrade guidelines section in the PR title. (example)
 If it would make sense to backport the change to LTS, a Jira issue must exist, be a Bug or Improvement, and be labeled as lts-candidate to be considered (see query).

commit.message:
[JENKINS-60972] Use "Dashboard" for 1st breadcrumb (w/ i18n)

This is a squashed commit of 8 original commits:

[JENKINS-60972] Workaround to use "Home" for 1st breadcrumb

This can be replaced when a proper Breadcrumbs module is build in the "backend" but might be a good temporary solution for now

[JENKINS-60972] Using Dashboard instead of Home for first breadcrumb

Dashboard is used in multiple places in the codebase to refer to that page, so seems a better fit. Otherwise, we'd need to rename all those other references to "home"

[JENKINS-60972] Added comment to breadcrumb if for "Dashboard"

(actually used this comment to trigger a rebuild)

[JENKINS-60972] Using choose/when/otherwise + anc.object == app

Better readability and avoiding replacing jobs named Jenkins, for instance

[JENKINS-60972] Adding i18n for breadcrumb

[JENKINS-60972] Simpler cluase comparing with "app" is enough. Tested.

And the extra comparison might lead to unexpected behaviors if there are extra spaces in the displayName in a particular language

[JENKINS-60972] Moved clarifying comment about breadcrumb  to the "choose"

[JENKINS-60972] Using title-case for i18n
